Title: Tiles from a courtyard floor in Iran
Brief Description: Border tile, glazed earthenware, in cuerda seca technique, yellow cloudband, turquoise saz leaf and yellow half-medallions on white ground, reportedly from a courtyard floor, mounted in a frame with nine other tiles from the same set, Iran, possibly 1800-1870
